head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HUBBARD, ROBERT COUGHLIN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HUBBARD, ROBERT COUGHLIN

block.p: HUBBARD--Robert Coughlin, died January 11 of cardiac disease. Graduated Princeton University and Yale Law School, partner of Satterlee Stephens Burke and Burke. Survived by wife, Patricia. Contributions to be sent to The YMCA Camping Services, Hugenott, NY. A memorial service at The Church of the Epiphany 74th and York, January 19th at 4:00pm.
